titleStmt.title: A charge of high-treason, prepared by the London-apprentices, against Col. Hewson; and the strange apparitions that appeared unto him, immediatly after his being taken near Plymouth in Cornwal; with his speech and confession to the vision.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for C. Gustavus, and are to be sold in Fleetstrs [sic],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
